base_description: Tall, white cabinet with shelves and drawers.
part_description: Four rectangular drawers on the right, three open shelves on the left. Drawers are vertically stacked, shelves are evenly spaced. Cabinet is angular with a flat top.
internal_interaction_description: The drawers slide in and out within the cabinet, allowing access to stored items. The shelves provide open storage space, supporting items placed on them. The structure is integrated to balance weight between drawers and shelves, ensuring stability.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall, used to store or display items. People interact by opening drawers or placing items on shelves. It can hold various objects like clothes, books, or decor, and fits into home or office environments.
